card.name: Groot
card.property: Flora Colossus â€” Forced Interrupt: When Groot would take any amount of damage, remove that many growth counters from him. For each growth counter removed this way, prevent 1 of that damage.

alternate.name: Groot
alternate.property: Growth Spurt â€” Action: Place 2 growth counters on Groot (to a maximum of 10). (Limit once per round.)

card.name: Fruition
card.property: Action: Place 2 growth counters on Groot (to a maximum of 10).
"I am Groot..." - Groot

card.name: "I am Groot"
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove threat from a scheme equal to the number of growth counters on Groot.
"I am Groot!!!" - Groot

card.name: "I. AM. GROOT!"
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal damage to an enemy equal to the number of growth counters on Groot.
"I. AM. GROOT!" - Groot

card.name: Root Stomp
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. If this attack defeats that enemy, place 1 growth counter on Groot (to a maximum of 10).
"I. Am. Groot." - Groot

card.name: "We Are Groot"
card.property: Hero Action: Remove up to 4 growth counters from Groot â†’ choose that many friendly characters. Give each of those characters a tough status card.
"We Are Groot." - Groot

card.name: Fertile Ground
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Fertile Ground â†’ place 1 growth counter on Groot (to a maximum of 10) and draw 1 card.
"I...am... Groot." - Groot

card.name: Entangling Vines
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When Groot makes a basic thwart, remove 1 growth counter from him and exhaust Entangling Vines â†’ Groot gets +2 THW for that thwart.
"I am. GROOT!" - Groot

card.name: Lashing Vines
card.property: Hero Response: After Groot uses a basic power, remove 2 growth counters from him and exhaust Lashing Vines â†’ ready Groot.
"I AM. Groot." - Groot

card.name: Vine Shield
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When Groot defends against an attack, remove 1 growth counter from him and exhaust Vine Shield â†’ Groot gets +3 DEF for that attack.
"I am Groot?" - Groot

card.name: Vine Spikes
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When Groot makes a basic attack, remove 1 growth counter from him and exhaust Vine Spikes â†’ Groot gets +2 ATK for that attack.
"We get it, you're Groot." - Rocket Raccoon

card.name: Starhawk
card.property: Interrupt: When Starhawk takes damage exactly equal to his remaining hit points, return him to your hand.
"I am one who knows"

card.name: Fighting Fit
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to the villain (5 damage instead if your hero's remaining hit points are equal to or greater than your hero's starting hit points).
"Prepare yourself, simpleton" - Drax

card.name: Dauntless
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. While your hero's remaining hit points are equal to or greater than your hero's starting hit points, your hero gains retaliate 1.

card.name: Hard to Ignore
card.property: Hero Response: After your hero defends against an attack and takes no damage, exhaust Hard to Ignore â†’ remove 1 threat from the main scheme.
"I will die before I yield!" - Drax

card.name: Rocket Raccoon
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Interrupt: When Rocket Raccoon attacks a minion, he gets +3 ATK for that attack. That attack gains overkill.

card.name: Flora and Fauna
card.property: Team Up (Groot and Rocket Raccoon). Max 1 per deck Hero Action: Place 2 growth counters on Groot (to a maximum of 10) and ready him, or place 2 charge counters on a Rocket Raccoon upgrade and ready that upgrade.

card.name: Deft Focus
card.property: Max 1 per player. Hero Action: Exhaust Deft Focus â†’ reduce the resource cost of the next [[superpower]] card you play this turn by 1.

card.name: Rocket Raccoon
card.property: "Murdered You!" â€” Response: After you deal excess damage to an enemy, draw 1 card.
"That's it! You can attack me, you can call me names, but NO ONE touches my blaster!"

alternate.name: Rocket Raccoon
alternate.property: Tinkering â€” Action: Choose and discard a [[tech]] upgrade you control â†’ draw 2 cards. (Limit once per round.)
"Ain't nothin' like me, 'cept me."

card.name: I've Got a Plan
card.property: Hero Response: After you make a basic thwart (using your THW), ready Rocket Raccoon. Rocket Raccoon gets +1 THW while in hero form until the end of the phase.
"No, I thought it'd be funny! Was it funny?" - Rocket Raccoon

card.name: Reload
card.property: Hero Action: Ready each [[tech]] upgrade you control.
"Me? I don't really care about people. I spend most of my time shooting at them." - Rocket Raccoon

card.name: Schadenfreude
card.property: Hero Action: Until the end of the turn, heal 2 damage from Rocket Raccoon each time you deal any amount of damage to an enemy.
"I live for the simple things... like how much this is gonna hurt." - Rocket Raccoon

card.name: Salvage
card.property: Response: After you spend this card, put a [[tech]] upgrade from your discard pile on top of your deck.

card.name: Battery Pack
card.property: Enters play with 2 charge counters on it. Action: Exhaust Battery Pack â†’ move a charge counter from this card to another [[tech]] upgrade you control.

card.name: Cybernetic Skeleton
card.property: You get +3 hit points. While in hero form, Rocket Raccoon gets +1 ATK.
"Yeah, yeah, look at the freak while you can." - Rocket Raccoon

card.name: Particle Cannon
card.property: Restricted. Enters play with 2 charge counters on it. Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Particle Cannon and remove 1 charge counter from it â†’ deal 4 damage to an enemy. This attack gains overkill and ranged.

card.name: Rocket Launcher
card.property: Restricted. Enters play with 2 charge counters on it. Hero Action: Exhaust Rocket Launcher and remove 1 charge counter from it â†’ choose a player. Deal 2 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with that player.

card.name: Rocket's Pistol
card.property: Restricted. Enters play with 3 charge counters on it. Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Rocket's Pistol and remove 1 charge counter from it â†’ deal 2 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Thruster Boots
card.property: While in hero form, Rocket Raccoon gets +1 THW and gains the [[aerial]] trait.
"Even from up here, I can tell that you're the ugliest human I've ever seen. And I hang out with Peter Quill." - Rocket Raccoon

card.name: Bug
card.property: Hero Response: After your hero makes a basic attack, heal 1 damage from Bug.
"Whoopee! We're a *tik* team again! There ain't no way they can *tik* stop us now!"

card.name: Looking for Trouble
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until you discard a minion. Put that minion into play engaged with you â†’ remove 3 threat from the main scheme.

card.name: Follow Through
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When your hero's attack deals any amount of excess damage, increase that amount by 1.
"That's a little excessive..."

card.name: Hand Cannon
card.property: Restricted. Uses (3 charge counters). Hero Interrupt: When your hero makes a basic attack, exhaust Hand Cannon and remove 1 charge counter from it â†’ your hero gets +2 ATK for that attack. That attack gains overkill.

card.name: Groot
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Response: After Groot defends against an attack, heal 2 damage from him.
"I am Groot!"

card.name: Booster Boots
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Max 1 per player. Hero Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, exhaust Booster Boots and discard the top card of your deck â†’ prevent 1 of that damage.

card.name: Brainstorm
card.property: Unit Cost 1. Hero Action (thwart): name a card type, then look at the top card of your deck. If that card is of named type, remove 3 threat from the main scheme. Place that card on the top or bottom of your deck, then draw 1 card.

card.name: By Any Means
card.property: Unit Cost 1. Hero Action (attack): Place 2 threat on the main scheme. Deal 3 damage to the villain. Draw 1 card.

card.name: Contingency Plan
card.property: Unit Cost 1. Hero Action (attack): Discard the top 4 cards of your deck. For each different resource type discarded this way, deal 1 damage to an enemy. Draw 1 card.

card.name: In Defiance
card.property: Unit Cost 1. Hero Interrupt: When an identity would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent 2 of that damage. Draw 1 card.

card.name: Calculate the Odds
card.property: Unit Cost 2. Hero Action: Draw 1 card and choose a player. That player may draw 1 card, then choose and discard 1 card from their hand.

card.name: Creative Solution
card.property: Unit Cost 2. Hero Action: Draw 1 card and remove a status card from any character. If the status card type removed this way was: - Tough - Deal 3 damage to an enemy. - Stun - Remove 3 threat from a scheme. - Confuse - Heal 3 damage from an identity.

card.name: Grapple
card.property: Unit Cost 2. Hero Action: Deal 1 damage to an enemy and stun it. Stun your hero. Draw 1 card.

card.name: Wing It
card.property: Unit Cost 2. Hero Action: Deal 1 damage to an enemy and confuse it. Confuse your hero. Draw 1 card.

card.name: Close Call
card.property: Unit Cost 3. Hero Interrupt: When a boost card is turned faceup, cancel that card's "Boost" ability and all of its boost icons ([boost]), then discard it. Draw 1 card.

card.name: Defy Danger
card.property: Unit Cost 3. Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy and discard the top card of the encounter deck? Take 1 damage for each boost icon ([boost]) discarded this way.

card.name: In Harm's Way
card.property: Unit Cost 3. Hero Action (thwart): Take 2 damage. Remove 5 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Take the Fight to Them
card.property: Unit Cost 3. Hero Action: Look at the top 2[per_player] cards of the encounter deck. Discard any number of those, then place the rest on the top and/or bottom of the encounter deck in any order. Draw 1 card.

card.name: Armor Plating
card.property: Unit Cost 4. Hero Interrupt: When an identity would take any amount of damage, exhaust Armor Plating â†’ prevent 1 of that damage (2 of that damage instead if you control the Milano).

card.name: Heavy Cannon
card.property: Unit Cost 4. Hero Action: Exhaust Heavy Cannon â†’ deal 1 damage to each enemy. If you control the Milano, deal 1 additional damage to the villain.

card.name: Hyper Thrusters
card.property: Unit Cost 4. Hero Action: Exhaust Hyper Thrusters â†’ remove 1 theat from each scheme. If you control the Milano, remove 1 additional threat from the main scheme.

card.name: Reactor Core
card.property: Unit Cost 4. Hero Action: Exhaust Reactor Core and discard the top 2 cards of your deck (the top card instead if you control the Milano) â†’ reduce the resource cost of the next event you play this turn by 1.

card.name: Ardent Resolve
card.property: Unit Cost 5. Hero Action: Ready a friendly character. Draw 1 card.

card.name: Onrush
card.property: Unit Cost 5. Hero Interrupt: When a card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel the effects of that card and discard it.

card.name: Safeguard
card.property: Unit Cost 5. Hero Action: Give up to 2 friendly characters each a tough status card. Draw 1 card.

card.name: Sure Gamble
card.property: Unit Cost 5. Hero Action: Reduce the resource cost of the next card played this phase by 3.

card.name: Cargo Hold
card.property: Unit Cost 6. Hero Action: Exhaust Cargo Hold â†’ heal 1 damage from a friendly character. If you control the Milano, heal 1 damage from you identity.

card.name: Mounted Laser
card.property: Unit Cost 6. Hero Action: Exhaust Mounted Laser â†’ deal 2 damage to an enemy (3 damage instead if you control the Milano).

card.name: Navigation Column
card.property: Unit Cost 6. Hero Action: Exhaust Navigation Column, choose and discard 1 card from your hand (discard the top card of your deck instead if you control the Milano) â†’ draw 1 card.

card.name: Targeting Screen
card.property: Unit Cost 6. Hero Action: Exhaust Targeting Screen â†’ remove 2 threat from a scheme (3 threat instead if you control the Milano).

card.name: Grand Strategy
card.property: Unit Cost 7. Hero Action: Draw up to your maximum hand size. Remove this card from the game.

card.name: Power Unleashed
card.property: Unit Cost 7. Hero Action: Deal 5 damage to the villain and remove 5 threat from the main scheme. Remove this card from the game.

card.name: Tried and True
card.property: Unit Cost 7. Hero Action: Choose a player. That player may add up to 3 cards from their discard pile to their hand. Remove this card from the game.

card.name: Triple Threat
card.property: Unit Cost 7. Hero Action: Ready up to 3 characters. Remove this card from the game.

card.name: Dead to Rights

card.name: Headhunter's Henchman
card.property: Surge. Patrol. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot thwart the main scheme.)

card.name: Wilt
card.property: Give to the Groot player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust your alter-ego â†’ remove Wilt from the game. - Remove 3 growth counters from Groot. If no growth counters were removed this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Blazing Inferno

card.name: Fan the Flames

card.name: Crisis on Halfworld
card.property: Give to the Rocket Raccoon player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust your alter-ego â†’ remove Crisis on Halfworld from the game. - Discard the highest cost upgrade you control. If no upgrade was discarded this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation

card.name: Drang
card.property: When Revealed: Discard the top 4[per_hero] cards of the encounter deck. card.name: Terrestrial Invasion
card.property: Contents: Drang (I) and Drang (II). (Drang (II) and Drang(III) instead for expert mode.) Brotherhood of Badoon, Ship Command, and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Band of Badoon). Setup: Put the Badoon Ship environment and the Milano support into play.

card.name: Drang's Spear
card.property: Attach to Drang. Drangs gains stalwart. (He cannot be stunned or confused.) Hero Action: Spend [mental][physical][physical] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Collector
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When a card (player or encounter) would be placed into a discard pile from play, put it faceup into The Collection instead.
"I have a display case ready and waiting for our newest acquisitions!"

card.name: Collector
card.property: When Revealed: In player order, each player must choose to either put the top card of their deck faceup into The Collection or take 3 damage. Forced Interrupt: When a card (player or encounter) would be placed into a discard pile from play, put it faceup into The Collection instead.

card.name: Collector
card.property: When Revealed: Put the top card of each player's deck faceup into The Collection. Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each card in The Collection. Forced Interrupt: When a card would be placed into a discard pile from play, put it faceup into The Collection instead, then place 1 threat on the main scheme.

card.name: The Grand Collection
card.property: Contents: Collector (I) and Collector (II). (Collector (II) and Collector (III) instead for expert mode.) Infiltrate the Museum, Galactic Artifacts, and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Menagerie Medley). Setup: Create "The Collection" game area (see insert for details). Put the top card of each player's deck faceup into The Collection.

alternate.name: The Grand Collection
alternate.property: Hero Action: Choose to either exhaust your hero or spend 2 ressources of any type â†’ discard 1 card from The Collection (to its owner's discard pile). (Limit once per round per player.) If there are at least 5[per_player] cards in The Collection or if this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

card.name: Biogram Image
card.property: Attach to Collector. Forced Interrupt: When Collector would take any amount of damage, put this card faceup into The Collection â†’ prevent all of that damage, then place threat on the main scheme equal to the amount prevented this way. After this activation ends, reveal this card.

card.name: Monarch Starstalker
card.property: Villainous. (When this minion activates, give it a boost card.)

card.name: Inconspicious Box
card.property: When Revealed: Put the lowest cost card you control faceup into The Collection. If you cannot, this card gains surge. If there are 3[per_player] or fewer cards in The Collection, put the top card of your deck faceup into The Collection.

card.name: View the Cosmos
card.property: When Revealed: Choose one : - Put the highest cost card from your hand faceup into The Collection. - Discard the highest cost card from your hand, then place threat on the main scheme equal to its printed cost.

card.name: Stay Awhile

When Revealed (Hero): Collector attacks you with +1 ATK. If you take any amount of damage from that attack, put the top card of your deck faceup into The Collection.

card.name: Caught Off Guard
card.property: When Revealed: Discard an upgrade or support you control. If no cards were discarded this way, this card gains surge.

card.name: Collector
card.property: [star] Collector gets +X SCH and +X ATK, where X is equal to the main scheme's current stage number. Forced Interrupt: When Collector would be defeated, remove 3[per_player] threat from the main scheme and flip this card instead.

card.name: Collector
card.property: [star] Collector gets +X SCH and +X ATK, where X is equal to the main scheme's current stage number. Forced Interrupt: When Collector would be defeated, remove 3[per_player] threat from the main scheme and flip this card instead.

card.name: The Missing Milano
card.property: Contents: Collector (A1) (Collector (B1) instead for expert mode.) Escape the Museum, Galactic Artifacts, Ship Command, and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Menagerie Medley). Setup: Put the Library Labyrinth environment into play. Set aside the Ship Command modular encounter set.

alternate.name: The Missing Milano
alternate.property: Forced Interrupt: When the last threat is removed from this scheme, advance to stage 2A (the players win by advancing). If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
You've been trapped inside the Collector's museum. Before you can escape, you must first find the Milano.

card.name: Lost in the Museum
card.property: When Revealed: Put the set-aside Milano support from the Ship Command encounter set into play unde the first player's control..
The Milano is being held in a massive container. You try to pry open the side, but ultimately resolve to smashing the glass as hard as you can.

alternate.name: Lost in the Museum
alternate.property: Forced Interrupt: When the last threat is removed from this scheme, advance to stage 3A (the players win by advancing). If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
Now that you've broken the Milano out of its cage, use it to find the front door!

card.name: The Great Escape
card.property: When Revealed: Flip Library Labyrinth. Place 1 acceleration token on the main scheme. Shuffle the remaining cards from the set-aside Ship Command encounter set into the encounter deck.
You've found the exit! As the Milano bursts into space and readies its thrusters, you see the Museum Ship's cannons beginning to charge.

alternate.name: The Great Escape
alternate.property: First Player Action: Exhaust the Milano â†’ remove 3 threat from here. If there is no threat here, the players win the game. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
Almost clear! Outrun the Museum Ship's cannons to make your final escape!

card.name: Library Labyrinth
card.property: "This way?" - Hero Action: Deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card â†’ remove 5 threat from the main scheme. (Limit once per round per player.)
The Collector's museum is a maze of miscellaneous trinkets from every culture and hapless creatures from every star system.

alternate.name: Museum Ship

card.name: "I Have You Now!"
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Exhaust your identity. Collector schemes. When Revealed (Hero): You are stunned. Collector attacks you. Give Collector a tough status card.

card.property: Incite 1. (When revealed, place 1 threat on the main scheme.) When Revealed: You are confused. If you are already confused, choose and discard 1 card you control.

card.name: Nebula
card.property: The first [[Technique]] attachment revealed each round gains surge. [star]Forced Interrupt: When Nebula initiates an activation against you, resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Technique]] attachment in play, then discard each of those attachments.

card.name: Nebula
card.property: The first [[Technique]] attachment revealed each round gains surge. [star]Forced Interrupt: When Nebula initiates an activation against you, resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Technique]] attachment in play, then choose and discard 1 of those attachments.

card.property: The first [[Technique]] attachment revealed each round gains surge. You may then remove the top card of your deck from the game to choose and discard 1 of those attachments.

card.name: The Art of Evasion
card.property: Contents: Nebula (I) and Nebula (II). (Nebula (II) and Nebula (III) instead for expert mode.) Nebula, Power Stone, Ship Command, and Standard encounter sets. Discard the top 2[per_player] cards of the encounter deck, then attach each [[Technique]] attachment discarded this way to Nebula.

alternate.name: The Art of Evasion
alternate.property: X is equal to the number of evasion counters on Nebula's Ship.
You've tracked Nebula's location but she's trying desperately to get away. This may be your only chance to take the Power Stone from her.

card.name: Warp Drive Initiated
card.property: When Revealed: Place 2 evasion counters on Nebula's Ship. For each evasion counter on Nebula's Ship, discard the top 2 cards of each player deck and the encounter deck.
With expert precision, Nebula's Ship pitches and yaws, outmaneuvering the Milano and putting Nebula just far enough away that she might have a chance to escape.

alternate.name: Warp Drive Initiated
alternate.property: X is equal to the number of evasion counters on Nebula's Ship. If this satge is completed, the players lose the game.
Nebula's engines are primed and ready. Take them out before she warp jumps!

card.name: Nebula's Ship
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase begins, place 1 evasion counter here. Shoot the Thrusters! - First Player Action: Exhaust the Milano and spend up to 2 resources of any type â†’ remove 1 evasion counter from here for each resource spent this way.

card.name: Cutthroat Ambition
card.property: Attach to Nebula. Nebula cannot take more than 5 damage from a single attack. Special: Place 1 threat on the main scheme. After this activation ends, attach this card to Nebula and resolve its "Special" ability.

card.name: Evasive Maneuvering
card.property: Attach to Nebula. Nebula gains stalwart. Special: You are stunned. If you are already stunned, give Nebula 1 facedown boost card. After this activation ends, attach this card to Nebula and resolve its "Special" ability.

card.name: Unyelding Persistence
card.property: Attach to Nebula. Nebula gains stalwart. Special: Give Nebula a tough status card. If Nebula already has a tough status card, give Nebula 1 facedown boost card. After this activation ends, attach this card to Nebula and resolve its "Special" ability.

card.name: Weapon Mastery
card.property: Attach to Nebula. Nebula gains retaliate 1. Special: Take 1 damage. After this activation ends, attach this card to Nebula and resolve its "Special" ability.

card.name: Wide Stance
card.property: Attach to Nebula. Reduce the amount of damage Nebula takes from each attack by 1. Special: Discard 1 card at random from your hand. After this activation ends, attach this card to Nebula and resolve its "Special" ability.

card.name: Lethal Intent
card.property: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Technique]] attachment is discarded. Reveal that card.

card.name: Barrel Roll
card.property: Incite 1. Surge. When Revealed: Place 1 evasion counter on Nebula's Ship. Place 1 evasion counter on Nebula's Ship.

card.name: Combat Ready
card.property: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Technique]] attachment is discarded. Reveal that card, then resolve its "Special" ability.
"I'll never be finished until I've gotten what I want." - Nebula

card.name: Ruthless
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Nebula schemes. If threat is placed by this activation, place 1 evasion counter on Nebula's Ship. When Revealed (Hero): Nebula attacks you. If damage is dealt by this activation, place 1 evasion counter on Nebula's Ship.

card.name: Ronan the Accuser
card.property: Toughness. [star]Forced Interrupt: When Ronan the Accuser activates against you, give him 1 additional boost card if you control the Power Stone.
"There is no discussion, no debate. You are guilty."

card.name: Ronan the Accuser
card.property: Toughness. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Cut the Power side scheme and reveal it. (Shuffle.) [star]Forced Interrupt: When Ronan the Accuser activates against you, give him 1 additional boost card if you control the Power Stone.

card.name: Ronan the Accuser
card.property: Retaliate 1. Toughness. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Superio Tactics side scheme and reveal it. (Shuffle.) [star]Forced Interrupt: When Ronan the Accuser activates against you, give him 1 additional boost card if you control the Power Stone.

card.name: Interception Imminent
card.property: Contents: Ronan the Accuser (I) and Ronan the Accuser (II). (Ronan the Accuser (II) and Ronan the Accuser (III) instead for expert mode.) Ronan the Accuser, Power Stone, Ship Command, and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Kree Militants). Setup: Put the Kree Command Ship environment and the Milano support into play. Attach the Universal Weapon to Ronan the Accuser. Attach the Power Stone to the first player.

alternate.name: Interception Imminent
alternate.property: First Player Action: Exhaust the Milano â†’ remove 3 threat from this scheme.
Ronan the Accuser's forces have ambushed the Milano, aiming to steal the Power Stone. With some quick wit and expert piloting, you may be able to halt their advance.

card.name: "Take What Is Mine"
card.property: When Revealed: Attach the Power Stone to Ronan the Accuser. If it is already attached to him, give him 1 facedown boost card.
Ronan the Accuser's ship has docked with yours. Boarding the Milano, he makes one strike of his Universal Weapon to knock you off your feet. Before you're able to recover, he grabs the Power Stone.

alternate.name: "Take What Is Mine"
alternate.property: While the Power Stone is attached to Ronan the Accuser, threat cannot be removed from this scheme. If this satge is completed, the players lose the game.
Ronan the Accuser holds the Power Stone! Wrest it from his control before it's too late.

card.name: Kree Command Ship
card.property: First Player Interrupt: When a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck, exhaust the Milano and spend 1 resource of any type â†’ cancel that card's "When Revealed" effects.

card.name: Universal Weapon
card.property: Attach to Ronan the Accuser. Ronan the Accuser gains stalwart. Hero Action: Take 2 dammage and deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card â†’ shuffle Universal Weapon into the encounter deck. Attach Universal Weapon to Ronan the Accuser.

card.name: Fanaticism
card.property: Surge. Attach to Ronan the Accuser. Uses (1 fury counter, plus 1[per_player] additional fury counters). [star]Forced Interrupt: When Ronan the Accuser attacks you, that attack gains overkill and piercing. At the end of that attack, remove 1 fury counter from here.

card.name: Cut the Power
card.property: Choose to either exhaust the Milano or place 2 threat on the main scheme.

card.name: Pincer Maneuver
card.property: Hinder 2[per_player] (When revealed, place 2[per_player] threat here.). First Player Action: Exhaust the Milano â†’ remove 3 threat from this scheme.

card.name: Superior Tactics
card.property: The Power Stone cannot be unattached from Ronan the Accuser. When Revealed: Attach the Power Stone to Ronan the Accuser. If it is already attached to him, place 1[per_player] threat here.
Ronan the Accuser's advanced Kree training and fanatical determination make him an opponen like no other.

card.name: Single-Minded Fury
card.property: When Revealed: Ronan the Accuser attacks the player who controls the Power Stone (even if that player is in alter-ego form). If no attack was made this way, this card gains surge. Attache the Power Stone to Ronan the Accuser.

card.name: Kree Physiology
card.property: Surge. When Revealed: Give Ronan the Accuser a tough status card. If he already has a tough status card, take 1 damage.
"Kneel before me!" - Ronan the Accuser

card.name: "You Stand Accused!"
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Ronan the Accuser schemes with +1 SCH. When Revealed (Hero): Ronan the Accuser attacks you with +1 ATK. Give the villain 1 additional boost card for this activation.

card.name: Badoon Assassin
card.property: Forced Response: After Badoon Assassin engages your hero, it attacks you with +2 ATK. If this activation is an attack, this attack gains overkill, piercing, and ranged.

card.name: Badoon Grunt
card.property: Forced Response: After Badoon Grunt engages you, if there are no other minions engaged with you, deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card. Put Badoon Grunt into play engaged with you.

card.name: Badoon Lieutenant
card.property: Patrol. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot thwart the main scheme.) If this activation is a scheme, this card gets +2 boost icons ([boost][boost]) for this activation.

card.name: Badoon Sentry
card.property: Retaliate 1. Give the villain a tough status card. If the villain already has a tough status card, this card gets +2 boost icons ([boost][boost]) for this activation.

card.name: Badoon Warlord
card.property: [star] Badoon Warlord's attacks gain overkill. If this activation is an attack, this card gets +2 boost icons ([boost][boost]) for this activation.

card.name: Cloak of Hercules
card.property: Attach to the enemy with the lowest ATK. Hero Action: Spend [physical][physical][physical] resources â†’ discard this card.
The cloak of the fabled hero Hercules. Those fortunate enough to don this mantle are granted unimaginable strenght.

card.name: Obedience Potion
card.property: Attach to your identity. Attached character gets -1 THW, -1 ATK, and -1 DEF. Hero Action: Take 1 damage and spend [mental][mental] resources â†’ discard this card. (Any player can do this.)

card.name: The Beyonder's Blazer
card.property: Attach to the enemy with the highest SCH. Hero Action: Place 2 threat on the main scheme and spend 2 resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: The Poison
card.property: Attach to your identity. Forced Interrupt: When your turn begins, place 1 poison counter here, the take 1 damage for each poison counter here. Hero Action: Spend 3 resources of different types â†’ discard this card. (Any player can do this.)
The deadliest toxin in the galaxy.

card.name: Vandarian Power Stone
card.property: Attach to the enemy with the lowest SCH. Hero Action: Spend [energy][energy][energy] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Hujahdarian Monarch Egg
card.property: Hinder 2[per_player]. Victory 0. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme may ready their identity.

card.name: Magical Teapot
card.property: Hinder 2[per_player]. Victory 0. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme may heal 4 damage from their identity.

card.name: Philosopher's Stone
card.property: Hinder 2[per_player]. Victory 0. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme may draw 2 cards.

card.name: Crystal Ball
card.property: Hinder 2[per_player]. Victory 0. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme may play a card from their hand, reducing its resources cost by 3.

card.name: Kree Combat Armor
card.property: Attach to the enemy with the highest ATK. Reduce the amount of damage attached character takes from each attack by 1. Hero Action: Spend 3 resources of the same type â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Kree Commando
card.property: Patrol. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot thwart the main scheme.) If this is an attack, this attack gains piercing.

card.name: Kree Lieutenant
card.property: Guard. Stalwart. (This character cannot be stunned or confused.) If this activation is an attack, this card gets +3 boost icons ([boost][boost][boost]) for this activation.

card.name: Kree Private
card.property: Quickstrike. (After this minion engages your hero, it attacks you.) If this activation is an attack, this attack gains overkill.

card.name: Psionic Ghost
card.property: When Revealed: You are confused. If you are already confused, take 1 damage. Put Psionic Ghost into play engaged with you.

card.name: Servant Bot
card.property: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.) Patrol. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot thwart the main scheme.)
"FIND. THE. INTRUDERS."

card.name: Starshark
card.property: Quickstrike. [star] Starshark's attacks deal indirect damage. Deal 1 damage to each character you control.

card.name: Pirate Commander
card.property: Quickstrike. [star] Forced Response: After this minion attacks and damages you, remove 1 card at random in your hand from the game. Give the villain 1 additional boost card for this activation.

card.name: Pirate Lackey
card.property: Quickstrike. [star] Forced Response: After this minion attacks and damages you, remove the top card of your deck from the game. Give the villain 1 additional boost card for this activation.

card.name: Sound the Alarms
card.property: Each enemy gets +1 ATK Reveal this card.

card.name: Honor Among Thieves
card.property: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Criminal]] minion is discarded. Reveal that minion, then give that minion a tough status card and the villain 1 facedown boost card.
A family that steals together stays together.

card.name: Milano
card.property: Permanent. Setup. The first player controls the Milano. Piloting - Resource: Exhaust the Milano â†’ generate a [wild] resource for any player.

card.name: Rogue Vessel
card.property: Surge. Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase ends, deal 1 damage to each player. First Player Action: Exhaust the Milano and spend 2 resources of any type â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Cannonade
card.property: Hinder 3[per_player] (When revealed, place 3[per_player] threat here.). First Player Action: Exhaust the Milano â†’ remove 3 threat from this scheme.

card.name: Blind Side
card.property: Peril. (While you are resolving this card, other players cannot help you.) When Revealed: Choose one: -Exhaust the Milano. -Spend [physical][physical] resources. - Stun the first player.

card.name: Hull Breach
card.property: Peril. (While you are resolving this card, other players cannot help you.) When Revealed: Choose one: -Exhaust the Milano. -Spend [mental][mental] resources. - Deal 3 damage to the first player.

card.name: Power Siphon
card.property: Peril. (While you are resolving this card, other players cannot help you.) When Revealed: Choose one: -Exhaust the Milano. -Spend [energy][energy] resources. - Discard 1 card at random from the first player's hand.

card.name: Special Delivery
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): You may exhaust the Milano. If you do not, the villain schemes with +1 SCH. When Revealed (Hero): You may exhaust the Milano. If you do not, the villain attacks you with +1 ATK.

card.name: Power Stone
card.property: Setup. Attach to the villain. Permanent. Forced Response: After a hero or villain deals 3 or more damage to attached character with a single attack, attach Power Stone to the attacking hero or villain.
